title: American-style chicken salad
ingredients: ['250g mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon soy sauce', '1cm piece root ginger, minced', '1 good handful fresh coriander, chopped', '1 red pepper, seeded and finely chopped', '450g cooked chicken breast, chopped', '1 (225g) tin water chestnuts, chopped', '110g pecan nuts, chopped', '110g seedless grapes, sliced', '110g chopped celery']
